pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṃ tahaṃ olokentā antaraghare gacchanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk7:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
